sec.7b2e1c90-1f45-4d2a-bb33-8e9d7c6b5a11: Pause to assess progress and remove blockers.
q.midday-emotion.prompt: Write down an emotion you've felt this morning.
q.midday-trigger.placeholder: A meeting, a conversation, a task.
q.midday-trigger.help: Identifying triggers can help you manage your energy.
q.midday-body.prompt: Where in the body did you feel it?
q.midday-body.placeholder: E.g., tight chest, relaxed shoulders, headache.
q.midday-body.help: Noticing physical sensations can increase awareness.
q.midday-thought.prompt: What thoughts went through your mind?
q.midday-thought.placeholder: E.g., 'I have too much to do', 'This is going well', 'I can't wait for this to be over'.
q.midday-thought.help: Our thoughts influence our feelings and energy.
q.midday-reframe.prompt: How could you reframe those thoughts?
q.midday-reframe.placeholder: E.g., 'I have a lot to do, but I can handle it if I focus on one thing at a time', 'This is going well, I'm making progress', 'This is tough but it will be over soon and I can learn from it'.
q.midday-reframe.help: Reframing can help shift your mindset and energy.
q.midday-progress.prompt: What progress have you made with your daily challenge so far?
q.midday-progress.placeholder: Write about any progress, breakthroughs, or wins.
q.midday-progress.help: Recognizing progress can boost motivation for the rest of the day.
sec.c0ffee00-1234-4abc-9def-000000000019: Reflect on wins, challenges, and learnings.
q.evening-challenge.prompt: How did you meet your challenge today?
q.evening-challenge.placeholder: Write about any progress, breakthroughs, or wins.
q.evening-challenge.help: Reflecting on wins can boost confidence and motivation.
q.evening-struggle.prompt: What did you struggle with today?
q.evening-struggle.placeholder: Write about any obstacles, frustrations, or setbacks.
q.evening-struggle.help: Acknowledging struggles can help you learn and grow.
q.evening-proud.prompt: What are you proud of today?
q.evening-proud.placeholder: Write about anything you're proud of, big or small.
q.evening-proud.help: Celebrating wins can build confidence and momentum.
q.evening-try-again.prompt: What will you try again tomorrow?
q.evening-try-again.placeholder: Write about what you'll commit to trying again or doing differently tomorrow.
q.evening-try-again.help: Planning your next step can help you keep making progress over time.
sec.deadbeef-aaaa-4bbb-8ccc-ffffffff0025: Commit, review, and plan your next step.
q.3d4e5f60-7182-494a-cb34-567890000029.p: Checked in with your accountability partner?
